title: A New Decree to Protect the Jews
summary: Mordecai is promoted, and Esther pleads with the king to reverse the original decree. Since it cannot be revoked, a new decree is issued allowing the Jews to defend themselves. Joy spreads among the Jews throughout the empire.

faq.question: Why couldnâ€™t the first decree be revoked?
faq.answer: Persian law did not allow royal decrees to be repealed.

faq.question: What did the new decree allow?
faq.answer: The Jews could defend themselves and fight back against any attackers.
